ChatMapperProject.Title: ORILE Warmup
ChatMapperProject.Author: SGI
ChatMapperProject.Description: Dialogue Database for Warm up round

Field.Hint: A name to reference this actor.
Field.Title: Name

Field.Hint: A collection of image files that represent this actor.
Field.Title: Pictures

Field.Hint: A short description of what makes this actor unique.
Field.Title: Description

Field.Hint: Mark this box if this actor is the main player character.
Field.Title: IsPlayer

Field.Hint: The actor's age in years.
Field.Title: Age

Field.Hint: The actor's gender.
Field.Title: Gender

Field.Hint: Rank or level to signify progression.
Field.Title: Rank

Field.Hint: Group that the actor is associated with.
Field.Title: Faction

Field.Hint: Classification to which the actor belongs.
Field.Title: Class

Field.Hint: Sub-classification to which the actor belongs.
Field.Title: Subclass

Field.Hint: What makes this actor special.
Field.Title: Ability

Field.Hint: Another form of classification.
Field.Title: Primary Race

Field.Hint: Another form of sub-classification.
Field.Title: Secondary Race

Field.Hint: Where this actor is from.
Field.Title: Hometown

Field.Title: Texture Files

Field.Title: Model Files

Field.Value: As a Sales Manager, your role is to check and verify the documents then send them to your colleagues for further processing.
